text: Luzon is a state island located in the northern archipelago of the Philippines, There are the regions of Ilocos Region, Cagayan Valley, Central Luzon, Metro Manila, Calabarzon, Mimaropa and Bicol Region.https://www.in- philippines.com/provinces-of-luzon ==List of provinces/counties of Luzon state== Province Capital Super-region Region Abra Bangued North Luzon CAR Albay LEGAZPI CITY (Bicol, Regional center) South Luzon Bicol Region Apayao Kabugao North Luzon CAR Aurora Baler Central Luzon Central Luzon Bataan Balanga City Batanes Basco North Luzon Cagayan Valley Batangas Batangas City South Luzon Calabarzon Benguet La Trinidad North Luzon CAR Bulacan Malolos City Central Luzon Central Luzon Cagayan TUGUEGARAO CITY (Regional center) North Luzon Cagayan Valley Camarines Norte Daet South Luzon Bicol Region Camarines Sur Pili Catanduanes Virac Cavite Imus City Calabarzon Ifugao Lagawe North Luzon CAR Isabela Ilagan City Cagayan Valley Ilocos Norte Laoag City Ilocos Region Ilocos Sur Vigan City Kalinga Tabuk City CAR Laguna Santa Cruz South Luzon Calabarzon La Union SAN FERNANDO CITY (Regional center) North Luzon Ilocos Region Marinduque Boac South Luzon Mimaropa Masbate Masbate City South Luzon Bicol Region Mountain Province Bontoc North Luzon CAR Nueva Ecija Palayan City Central Luzon Central Luzon Nueva Vizcaya Bayombong North Luzon Cagayan Valley Occidental Mindoro Mamburao South Luzon Mimaropa Oriental Mindoro CALAPAN CITY (Regional center) Palawan Puerto Princesa City (Highly Urbanized city) Pampanga SAN FERNANDO CITY (Regional center) Central Luzon Central Luzon Pangasinan Lingayen North Luzon Ilocos Region Quezon Lucena City (Highly Urbanized city) South Luzon Calabarzon Quirino Cabarroguis Central Luzon Cagayan Valley Rizal Antipolo City South Luzon Calabarzon Romblon Romblon Mimaropa Sorsogon Sorsogon City Bicol Region Tarlac Tarlac City Central Luzon Central Luzon Zambales Iba ==References== * Provinces
